snippet: ADLER--Robert. The Membership and Board of Governors of the Boca Rio Golf Club, Boca Raton, Florida announce with deep regret and sorrow the passing of our former President and member Bob Adler, July 6, 2016 and extend our sincerest condolences to...
lead_paragraph: ADLER--Robert. The Membership and Board of Governors of the Boca Rio Golf Club, Boca Raton, Florida announce with deep regret and sorrow the passing of our former President and member Bob Adler, July 6, 2016 and extend our sincerest condolences to his family. David Beckerman President Boca Rio Golf Club, Inc. 1/3
